markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Ape](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=6)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 23</row>

While many apes exhibit peaceful or reclusive behavior, gorillas can be territorial, and the megaprimatus is especially aggressive and dangerous.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Gorilla](/Monsters.aspx?ID=25) (Creature 3), [Megaprimatus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=26) (Creature 8)
name: Ape
